Text: Before uploading a new torrent, it's a good practice to see if what you're sharing is /already/ shared. In the case of the FSX installation discs, it has been for a very, very long time (http://thepiratebay.se/search/flight%20simulator%20x%20acceleration/0/99/0)
Second Mutton. You disrespect the original uploader by stealing leeches and seeders. Ultimately, both torrents become weakened as new leeches do not know which to populate.
